questions.text: Have you seen advertisements placed by the Tobacco Institute concerning suokers and nonsuokers?
How many of such ads have you seen?
Do you think the ads present a fair and accurate picture?
Do you think the ads are unfair and deceptive?
Have the ads affected the views of smokers concerning the issue of their relationship with nonsmokers?
Have the ads affected the views of nonsmokers concerning the issue of their relationship with smokers?
Should the Tobacco Institute be prohibited from continuing to fund these advertisements?
Should the Tobacco Institute be required to present corrective statements to the public in future ads?
Do you have any other comments or suggestions concerning this matter?
